system.requirements: Tier 2; Any Essential Repair Skill +20, Tech-Use +10. Aptitudes: Intelligence, Tech
system.effect:
The Character can make Repair Tests as a Rush Job and suffer a -10 Penalty instead of the normal -30. 
When making Careful Repairs, they increase repair time by 25% instead of 50% (IE, a 12 Hour repair takes 15 Hours instead of 18).
Essential Repair Skill: Common Lore(Mechanicus) or Common Lore (Tech), or Forbidden Lore (Mechanicus)
